content.prompt: Tanucciâ€™s opinion of the people of Naples most clearly exemplifies which of the following?

choices.label: Concern about the erosion of traditional values as a result of urbanization

Fears that Italy was reaching Malthusian population limits
The Enlightenment belief in the perfectability of humanity

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
